name: Chinese Newcomers Service Center
description: The Chinese Newcomers Service Center (CNSC) mission is to provide underserved communities with social, economic, workforce, and business services to transform their lives. CNSC is a nonprofit organization that provides multilingual services that help Chinese Immigrants adapt to life in the United States. CNSC serves as a bridge between the two cultures, enhancing the physical, mental, social, and economic wellbeing of immigrants, thus facilitating their efforts to become self-sufficient, contrib
